data.title: A blast of water fun
data.text: This is a superb community war we park for cooling off on a hot summer day.  Lots of kids having a blast. Big enough that adults can find room for a relaxing cooldown. Highly recommend.

data.title: Little Mates is AWESOME!
data.text: I have 2 kiddos 4yrs and under. The Little Mates time an hour before the park opens to everyone is AMAZING! There are fun things for them to do, even a slide! It's sooo nice that it's not crowded for the little ones. They can actually play where they want with no lines. It's also nice that it's not as busy so you can't lose them in the shuffle of kids.  I would definitely suggest this if you have kids under the age of 6!

data.title: Fun for everyone
data.text: Looking for a relaxing way to spend the day and we came across this great little waterpark.  Our kids were entertained (ages 10, 9 & 7) for hours.   There were 4 or 5 different slides, large zero entry pool, lazy river.   Tons of lifeguards and they do the hourly "everyone out of the water" check which was great.  Get there right when they open if  you want to get some chairs.

data.title: fun for all ages
data.text: excellent assortment of water slides, good sized lazy river. put-put golf, typical concessions. best water park this side of the wisconsin dells.

data.title: Family Fun
data.text: Water slides for all ages, from toddlers to more adept swimmers. The lazy river allows some time to break from swimming and relax.

data.title: Great staff and lifeguard
data.text: The people at Cascade are wonderfull. The head lifegaurd, Connor, is the most attentive and friendly,  lifegaurd . This is the most pupular and funnest water park in MN

data.title: awesome!
data.text:
Our first time here on 7/26/16 with my husband & our 7yr old & we had a blast!Their lifeguards are sooooooo much more attentive than the ones at Waterpark of America. 

We arrived a few minutes after it opened & there was plenty of space, but soon became busy with 4 large groups on a Tuesday. Everyone was respectful & had a great time. We will be season ticket holders for sure!

data.title: A great summer heat relief
data.text: Cascade Bay in Eagan is the perfect place to escape the sweltering heat even if you don't have children.  My sister and I are empty nesters visiting our father. We needed a fun place to go where we could be outside but not suffer from the 98° weather. This city owned water park was perfect! We arrived at 12:30 but still landed 2 deck chaises by the lazy river. The young employees were all courteous and helpful.  The atmosphere was relaxed and happy. Everyone seemed to be enjoying themselves. Lots of families with kids of all ages,  young couples and seniors like us. We will go back next year!

data.title: Great place for th Grandkids
data.text:
Our kids come for Vacation Bible School each year.  We always spend at least one afternoon here.  The kids just love it!

I understand they just spent a lot on a remodel.  I didn't see it.  But, still a nice place

data.title: Great place
data.text: This was a great place for my family of 5 one of which is 4. Not to crowded. We went on a Thursday. Get there early if you want good parking and seating. That day was very hot so sitting under the umbrella would have been nice. Things for the whole family to do and enjoy. Price was reasonable.

data.title: Well maintained park
data.text:
Phenomenal water park. It is clean and family-oriented.  We have gone here for 15 years, and had passes for most of those years.

This park hires only certified life guards and continuously trains them throughout the summer. We have never had an issue with the staff, always friendly and professional.

data.title: Awesome waterpark
data.text: Loved the waterpark.  So much to do!  Lots of slides and even a lazy river!  Prices weren't too bad at the concession stand.  Even though we waited about 8 min for mini donuts and there wasn't anyone ahead of us.

data.title: NOT TOO BIG NOT TOO SMALL
data.text: This is a clean, well managed water park. Lots of life guards. It has a few bigger slides, a lazy river, kiddie area and sandbox. My kids are 12 and 13 and still have a good time.

data.title: Go to Apple Valley
data.text:
No coolers or outside food! We packed a lunch because we are on a budget. Well, we can get a stamp to go outside and eat on the grassy knoll. 
Apple Valley Aquatic Center allows food and drink. Shoulda, coulda, woulda, went to Apple Valley.
The kids seemed to enjoy it.

data.title: Cardio Bay
data.text: Cascade Bay offers morning and evening water walking and cardio classes, the classes are fun, just show up, you can purchase an unlimited pass for the adult classes and walking, a great buy. The facilities are clean and well run, a great facility.

data.title: Awesome place for the price and attractions
data.text:
This is sort of a hidden gem in the twin cities. Good selection of water slides, and a lazy river that is not so lazy that you have to assist with paddling. Lots of chairs and a HUGE grassy area to just lay out and relax. 
Not sure why anyone would want to pay double at the other places that are indoors and LOUD, unless it's freezing outside. Not many places like this around where you can take a family and not break the bank.
Was fairly busy the day we went and lines were moving along nicely.

data.title: Great local waterpark
data.text: This park is perfect for the family that doesn't want to go to the Dells, or spend $40 for WPoA. It's small enough for young kids and adults to have fun. Not much for food choice, but if you bring your own snacks (no glass) it's a fun day.

data.title: For all ages
data.text: Great place for kids and adults to relax and enjoy some water fun.   Slides, a lazy river, lounging chairs nice bathrooms.

data.title: Outstanding outdoor water park!
data.text: We went to Eagan's Cascade Bay Waterpark twice last summer with our grandchildren.  It's a great place to play.  The slides, lazy river and pools are all extremely clean.  There are plenty of lifeguards to watch over us.  They are well trained and do their jobs well.  There are plenty of chairs, both lounge and straight.  Lots of umbrellas.  On a nice day, it's a good idea to get there early because the park fills up quickly.  We definitely will plan on going back this year.

data.title: Great place for a summer day
data.text: Very nice water park with a lazy river, water slides, and big pool. Also has mini golf. As for me I could just sit on a tube and go around the lazy river for an hour or so and occasionally get sprayed by the fountains
